Property
template<typename T>
Property

Defines syntactic sugar for creating C# like properties. Specifically, I want to be able to do things like this: Vector3 v; Vector3 q = v.zyx; where 'zyx' is a getter that performs swizzling. I don't want to just expose a public member since that would require storing all the permutations of v.xyz.

Ideas in this code were borrowed from stack overflow: https://​stackoverflow​.com​/questions​/4225087​/c-like-properties-in-native-c
